document.full_text: heavy explosions rocked the yemeni capital sanaa in the small hours of thursday as fighting to topple the veteran president, ali abdullah saleh, threatened to descend into civil war.
document.title: civil war looms as big blasts rock yemeni capital
lines_and_colors: heavy explosions rocked the yemeni capital sanaa in the small hours of thursday as fighting to topple the veteran president, ali abdullah saleh, threatened to descend into civil war.
